content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 15, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 55, "index": 25}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 27, "index": 33}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 34}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 6, "index": 35}, {"type": "potato", "quantity": 21, "index": 40}, {"type": "vex_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft an crafting_table, I need to craft some acacia_planks. To craft acacia_planks, I need to place 1 stripped_acacia_wood into the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the stripped_acacia_wood from slot 25 into slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 15, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 54, "index": 25}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 27, "index": 33}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 34}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 6, "index": 35}, {"type": "potato", "quantity": 21, "index": 40}, {"type": "vex_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 42}]
thought: The dark_oak_planks have been crafted. I will move them from the crafting output slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 15, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 54, "index": 25}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 27, "index": 33}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 34}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 6, "index": 35}, {"type": "potato", "quantity": 21, "index": 40}, {"type": "vex_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a crafting_table, I need to place 4 planks side by side in a square in the crafting grid. There are dark_oak_planks in slot 13, so I will move them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 15, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 54, "index": 25}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 27, "index": 33}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 34}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 6, "index": 35}, {"type": "potato", "quantity": 21, "index": 40}, {"type": "vex_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 42}]
thought: There are still more dark_oak_planks in slot 13, so I will move them to slot 2 which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 15, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 13}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 54, "index": 25}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 27, "index": 33}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 34}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 6, "index": 35}, {"type": "potato", "quantity": 21, "index": 40}, {"type": "vex_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 42}]
thought: There are no more dark_oak_planks in slot 13, but there are oak_planks in slot 17. Oak_planks can also be used to craft a crafting_table, so I will move them to slot 4 which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 4 with quantity 1
